name: Olddays-forge
tagline: OldDays, NBXLite, and the other notsalgia-mods by Exalm ported to Forge!
body:
#OldDays Forge
Porting all the epic nostalgia mods by Exalm to Minecraft Forge.

* Original code by Exalm
* Porting done by CliffracerX
* Some textures by Mojang

Screenshots and downloads coming soon!  =)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
